meanings.sent1: The mother was excited to meet her unborn baby.
meanings.sent2: The unborn chicks were still inside their eggs.
meanings.sent3: The family joked that the unborn kitten was already causing trouble.
meanings.sent4: The garden was like an unborn promise, waiting to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The image of the unborn stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: The artist's unborn masterpiece was taking shape in his mind.
meanings.sent2: The unborn ideas in her notebook were waiting to be developed.
meanings.sent3: The team referred to their unfinished project as the unborn dragon.
meanings.sent4: The unwritten novel was an unborn adventure waiting to unfold.
meanings.sent5: The unborn dreams in her heart were like seeds waiting to grow.

meanings.sent1: The inventor's unborn invention was a secret waiting to be revealed.
meanings.sent2: The unborn company was just an idea in the entrepreneur's mind.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully called the new recipe his unborn masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The unwritten song was an unborn melody waiting to be sung.
meanings.sent5: The unborn possibilities of the future were endless.
